title: Virtusa Receives Silver Stevie® Award for Excellence in Technical Innovation
text:
[October 13, 2015] Virtusa Receives Silver Stevie® Award for Excellence in Technical Innovation 
Virtusa Corporation (NASDAQ GS: VRTU), a global business consulting and IT outsourcing company that combines innovation, technology leadership and industry solutions to transform the customer experience, has been honored with a 2015 Silver Stevie Award for technical innovation. The Stevie Awards, presented by the American Business Awards, recognized Virtusa in the Technical Innovation of the Year category for the Virtusa Test Automation Framework (VTAF). 
"We're honored to receive the Stevie award from the American Business Awards for technical innovation for our Virtusa Test Automation Framework," said Chinthi Weerasinghe, vice president and joint-head of the Independent Software Quality (ISQ) practice at Virtusa. "Our framework enables our clients to quickly and easily test script development - an essential step in the process when bringing new solutions to market. This innovation is helping companies automate services, reduce costs, increase testing speed and maximize productivity and we're thrilled to be recognized for our innovation." 
The Virtusa Test Automation Framework is a testing framework that can be used by non-technical QA engineers; it uses simple English to develop tool agnostic test scripts, increase test coverage and greatly accelerate test script development. The VTAF Auto 4GL tool automates the process of script generation and eliminates the technical and idiosyncratic element of developing test scripts. 
Virtusa's ISQ Practice brings unique differentiators and proven experience to its client engagements including rich productengineering heritage, innovative tools and accelerators, strong test execution capabilities, SLA and metric driven approach, coupled with a robust project governance methodology and a continuous focus on QA improvements. 
The American Business Awards are the nation's premier business awards program. All organizations operating in the U.S. are eligible to submit nominations. 
TheStevie Award joins Virtusa's growing list of 2015 awards and recognitions. The company was recognized as a Leader on IAOP's 2015 Global Outsourcing 100® service providers list, included in the Gartner ( News - Alert ) Magic Quadrant for IT Services for Communications Service Providers and named a major contender in Everest Group's PEAK Matrix for Independent Testing Services among others. 
Details about the American Business Awards and the list of Stevie winners who were announced in San Francisco on September 11 are available here: http://www.stevieawards.com/pubs/awards/403_2949_25773.cfm 
For more information on VTAF, visit: http://www.virtusa.com/services/independent-software-quality/qa-innovation/virtusa-s-test-automation-framework/ 
About Virtusa Virtusa provides end-to-end information technology (IT) services to Global 2000 companies. These services, which include IT consulting, application maintenance, development, systems integration and managed services, leverage a unique Platforming methodology that transforms clients' businesses through IT rationalization. Virtusa helps customers accelerate business outcomes by consolidating, rationalizing, and modernizing their core customer-facing processes into one or more core systems. 
Virtusa delivers cost-effective solutions through a global delivery model, applying advanced methods such as Agile ( News - Alert ) and Accelerated Solution Design to ensure that its solutions meet the clients' requirements. As a result, its clients simultaneously reduce their IT operations cost while increasing their ability to meet changing business needs. 
Founded in 1996 and headquartered in Massachusetts, Virtusa has operations in North America, Europe and Asia.
